Class BaseCopyFileSubmitAction

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CopyFileCentralSubmitAction, CopyFileLocalSubmitAction, CopyFileSandboxSubmitAction

    public abstract class BaseCopyFileSubmitAction
extends BaseSetOperateOnSelectedItemsAction
    BaseCopyFileSubmitAction This is the submit action for all three 'copy config file' pages, because the actual work for copying a config file is the same no matter what type of channel you are copying from or to.

    • Method Detail

      • processMethodKeys

        protected void processMethodKeys(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapIn)
        This method is used to add additional buttons to a list display. It is called from getKeyMethodMap. Simply add your resource bundle name as the key to the given map, and the method name as the value. For example, if you have a resource bundle key of "failed.jsp.rescheduleActions" and a method in your Struts action called "rescheduleAll" the result should look as follows: map.put("failed.jsp.rescheduleActions", "rescheduleAll"); If there are no additional actions then simply return.
        Specified by:
        processMethodKeys in class RhnListDispatchAction
        Parameters:
        mapIn - Mapping between method and button names.
